name: jsforce_downloader
description: Extract report data from Salesforce. It can download more than 2000 rows. The report must have a standard date filter. The program will iterate day by day – changing the standard date filter – to download the results. Since Sync report runs have a daily limit, Async report runs are used instead. The program runs multiple days in parallel to speed up the process.
author: Divya Mahajan <dvm@vanmahajan.com> (http://vanmahajan.github.io)
